00042 // This struct passes data between the main thread and the worker threads
00043 struct threadlist_entry
00044 {
00045         // The sound object to render
00046         Sound *snd;
00047         // A pointer to the result of the rendering
00048         MultiTrack *resultTrack;
00049         // A flag to indicate we are finished
00050         int done;
00051         // A pointer to the worker thread
00052         pthread_t *thread;
00053         // A pointer to the mutex to use
00054         pthread_mutex_t *listMutex;
00055         // A pointer to the condition to signal when done
00056         pthread_cond_t *finishCondition;
00057 
00058         // Rendering parameters
00059         int numChannels;
00060         m_rate_type samplingRate;
00061 };
